params._sortedAddresses: Array of addresses sorted by d_val descending.

calculateIntermediateValues().notice: Anyone can call this after Reveal1 time ends. Computes Omega_v and d_i values for valid participants.

reveal1(bytes32).notice: Reveal inner commitment co_i. Verified against cv_i.

reveal2(bytes32).notice: Reveal final secret s_i. Must be done in order.

skipStalledUser().notice: Liveness protection. If the current user sleeps, skip them.

submitRevealOrder(address[]).notice: Submits the calculated reveal order. Gas Optimization: Sorting is done off-chain. Contract only verifies the order.
